title: THE ULTIMATE TRACTOR TIRE GUIDE: TREAD PATTERN OPTIONS!

tasks.task: Determine physical tasks relevant to operating and using agricultural tractor tires.
subtasks: Identify different tread patterns for tractor tires (R1, R4, R3, HDAP, VersaTurf).
Compare price points and construction types (radial vs. biased) of the tires.
Evaluate traction performance on lawns (gentle vs. aggressive patterns).
Assess suitability for paved surfaces (road wear and ride comfort).
Rank tires for snow and ice conditions (traction on soft and hard surfaces).
Differentiate tread patterns for dirt and mud (self-cleaning ability and grip).
Understand the versatility and limitations of R4 tires in multi-purpose applications.
Explore options for enhancing tractor stability (dual wheels or spacers) for steep slopes.
Research where to purchase tires and access discount codes through linked websites.
